definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: We broke through the border positions southwest of Kalwarya.
sentences.chinese: 我們突破了卡爾沃亞西南的邊境陣地。

sentences.english: The BLOs provide short-term shelter and can provide medical care.
sentences.chinese: 這些邊境聯絡處提供短期的庇護和醫療。

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿邊境活躍的唯一非停火武裝是南撣邦軍701部隊。

sentences.english: The plan is for trains to make their first stop outside China in the border town of Boten in northern Laos.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃在中國邊境外的第一站是老撾北部城鎮磨憨。

sentences.english: Owais Ghani is the top administrator of Pakistan's tribal regions as the governor of the North West Frontier Province.
sentences.chinese: 加尼是巴基斯坦西北邊境省省長。

sentences.english: In 1890, the U.S. Census Bureau declared that there was no longer such a thing as the American frontier.
sentences.chinese: 在1890年，美國統計局公佈並無美國邊境這一說。

sentences.english: Tswana speakers tend to live near the border with Botswana.
sentences.chinese: 說茨瓦納語的人一般住在博茨瓦納邊境附近。

sentences.english: In the foyer, herringbone hardwood floors with a walnut border were installed.
sentences.chinese: 在門廳裏，人字形硬木地板與核桃邊境被安裝。

sentences.english: A few years ago, all the Border Collies in a sheepdog trial would have been black and white or tricolor.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，在牧羊比賽中邊境基本是黑白色或三色。

sentences.english: Border Patrol Special Response Team searches a hotel room-by-room in New Orleans in response to Hurricane Katrina.
sentences.chinese: 邊境特別反映巡邏隊逐屋搜索新奧爾良的一家旅館。

sentences.english: The government has closed the entire border in Rafah and all the roads.
sentences.chinese: 哈馬斯關閉了拉法的整個邊境和所有的公路。

sentences.english: A ceasefire will take effect in just hours on the Lebanese-Israeli border.
sentences.chinese: 黎以邊境再過幾個小時就可以實現停火了。

sentences.english: The Thai government has no intention of closing the Thai-Cambodia border and will not use military force to deal with this bilateral problem, he said.
sentences.chinese: 但他表示泰國不會關閉兩國邊境或動用武力解決問題。

sentences.english: Many more are waiting to cross the border.
sentences.chinese: 而且有更多的人在等待通過邊境。

sentences.english: As far as I know, there is no such "face-off" between China and India in the border area.
sentences.chinese: 據我瞭解，中印邊境地區目前不存在“對峙”情況。

sentences.english: The frontiers of the City are indeed guarded by dragons.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市的確是由龍來守衛邊境的。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
